title: Bg. 11.31
sanskrit: आख्याहि मे को भवानुग्ररूपोनमोऽस्तु ते देववर प्रसीद ।विज्ञातुमिच्छामि भवन्तमाद्यंन हि प्रजानामि तव प्रवृत्तिम् ॥ ३१ ॥
transliteration: ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugra-rūponamo ’stu te deva-vara prasīdavijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṁna hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim

words_trans.deva-vara: O great one amongst the demigods

literary_trans: O Lord of lords, so fierce of form, please tell me who You are. I offer my obeisances unto You; please be gracious to me. You are the primal Lord. I want to know about You, for I do not know what Your mission is.O Lord of lords, so fierce of form, please tell me who You are. I offer my obeisances unto You; please be gracious to me. You are the primal Lord. I want to know about You, for I do not know what Your mission is.
